code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{fetchEvents}from'../services/api';import'./Home.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const[events,setEvents]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const getEvents=async()=>{try{const data=await fetchEvents();setEvents(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching events:',error);}};getEvents();},[]);const handleViewDetails=id=>{navigate(`/event/${id}`);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Upcoming Events"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"event-cards",children:events.map(event=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:event.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:event.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Date of Event: ",new Date(event.dateOfEvent).toLocaleDateString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",event.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleViewDetails(event._id),children:"View Details"})]},event._id))})]});}export default Home;
